name: automation-studiojekyll
title: Automation Studiojekyll
author: mike.maggire

scripts.prelivebuild:jekyll: bundle exec jekyll clean && md _site && ping -n 3 127.0.0.1 > nul
scripts.prebuild:deploy: bundle exec jekyll clean && rimraf docs && md docs
scripts.prebuild:prod: npm version minor && git push origin --tags && npm run createversionfile
